name: nvm
description: Node Version Manager - Simple bash script to manage multiple active node.js versions

scripts.test: shell=$(basename -- $(ps -o comm= $(ps -o ppid= -p $PPID)) | sed 's/^-//'); make test-$shell
scripts.test/fast: shell=$(basename -- $(ps -o comm= $(ps -o ppid= -p $PPID)) | sed 's/^-//'); make TEST_SUITE=fast test-$shell
scripts.test/slow: shell=$(basename -- $(ps -o comm= $(ps -o ppid= -p $PPID)) | sed 's/^-//'); make TEST_SUITE=slow test-$shell
scripts.test/install_script: shell=$(basename -- $(ps -o comm= $(ps -o ppid= -p $PPID)) | sed 's/^-//'); make TEST_SUITE=install_script test-$shell
scripts.test/installation: npm run --silent test/installation/node && npm run --silent test/installation/iojs
scripts.test/installation/node: shell=$(basename -- $(ps -o comm= $(ps -o ppid= -p $PPID)) | sed 's/^-//'); make TEST_SUITE=installation_node test-$shell
scripts.test/installation/iojs: shell=$(basename -- $(ps -o comm= $(ps -o ppid= -p $PPID)) | sed 's/^-//'); make TEST_SUITE=installation_iojs test-$shell
scripts.test/sourcing: shell=$(basename -- $(ps -o comm= $(ps -o ppid= -p $PPID)) | sed 's/^-//'); make TEST_SUITE=sourcing test-$shell

author: Tim Caswell <tim@creationix.com>
